animeDescription: The premise of the story: "Snatch the rebel elements' secret data using the Surface! There is a leak saying that the giant coporation Ishimiya Industry will commit an act of international terrorism, and Motoko Kusanagi and the Armored Riot Police head out to seize the plug data!"(Source: ANN)A short animation for promoting Microsoft's Surface tablet in Japan.
